page.title: 04RELIGION CONTINUED
page.content: They have a garden of about an acre next to a large field,on the other side is a rough sloping carpark which always overflows on Sundays.The rectory is opposite the church. When Samuel Evans was rector at Taxal, Colonel Hall came to church .The two men had a fight.When the fight was over the Colonel said he would never come to Taxal Church again so he had Trinity Church built in 1904.Trinity church has no tower and no pews,it has wooden chairs linked together .It only has one stained glass window at the end. On the walls are two carved murals.One depicting the birth of Jesus and one depicting his return in the Garden. by Gareth Cross and Jess Wood
